technique involved in this method is the suppression of the surface wave propagation.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Wireless Sensor Node for Chemical Agent Detection
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Wireless sensor node for chemical agent detection

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
In this paper, we present the design and implementation of awireless sensor node prototype for the detection of a toxicchemical agent. Wireless sensor node electronics, antenna andsensor head are integrated in a package. The proposedprototype operates using the Long Range (LoRa) wirelesscommunication protocol at 2.4 GHz, with a sensor headimplemented on optical fiber supporting the surface plasmonresonance (SPR) phenomenon for the detection of Di-MethylMethyl Phosphonate (DMMP) vapor, a simulant of the nerveagent Sarin.
Keywords
Wireless circuit design, dual polarized antenna, integratedelectronics, surface plasmon resonance, Frame Slotted-ALOHA,Long Range modulation, Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, WirelessSensor Network.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
In this paper, we present the design and implementation of awireless sensor node prototype for the detection of a toxicchemical agent. Wireless sensor node electronics, antenna andsensor head are integrated in a package. The proposedprototype operates using the Long Range (LoRa) wirelesscommunication protocol at 2.4 GHz, with a sensor headimplemented on optical fiber supporting the surface plasmonresonance (SPR) phenomenon for the detection of Di-MethylMethyl Phosphonate (DMMP) vapor, a simulant of the nerveagent Sarin.
Keywords
Wireless circuit design, dual polarized antenna, integratedelectronics, surface plasmon resonance, Frame Slotted-ALOHA,Long Range modulation, Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, WirelessSensor Network.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Synthesis of spinel ferrites from cashew gum for microwave devices application
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Synthesis of spinel ferrites from cashew gum for microwave devices application

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Propriedades Físicas dos Metais e Ligas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: An eco-friendly sol-gel method was used to synthesize spinel nanoparticles (NPs) MxFeyO4, with M being cobalt (Co) or nickel (Ni), and the molar ratio of y/x varying between 1 and 2. These nanoparticles were intended for electromagnetic sensors. Characterization via X-ray diffraction (XRD) with Rietveld refinements and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) with small-angle electron diffraction (SEAD) confirmed that all samples are single-phase with a spinel structure and crystallite sizes ranging from 38.5 to 69.3 nm. Coplanar microwave sensors using these NPs involved vector analysis for measuring S-parameters.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: An eco-friendly sol-gel method was used to synthesize spinel nanoparticles (NPs) MxFeyO4, with M being cobalt (Co) or nickel (Ni), and the molar ratio of y/x varying between 1 and 2. These nanoparticles were intended for electromagnetic sensors. Characterization via X-ray diffraction (XRD) with Rietveld refinements and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) with small-angle electron diffraction (SEAD) confirmed that all samples are single-phase with a spinel structure and crystallite sizes ranging from 38.5 to 69.3 nm. Coplanar microwave sensors using these NPs involved vector analysis for measuring S-parameters.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Double Sided Band-pass Frequency Selective Surface Based onMatryoshka Geometry
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Synthesis of spinel ferrites from cashew gum for microwave devices application

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: JOURNAL OF MICROWAVES, OPTOELECTRONICS AND ELECTROMAGNETIC APPLICATIONS

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper describes the development of a double sided band-pass frequency selective surface based on Matryoshka geometry, preserving features such as miniaturization, multiband operation and the stability of polarization and incidence angle. Unlike cascaded FSSs, the proposed FSS uses only one substrate layer, with the Matryoshka geometry being used on one of its faces and a square loop on the other. The use of only one layer of substrate reduces the volume, as well as facilitates the fabrication process, since it avoids the use of spacers. On the other hand, the square loop allows to improve of the frequency response. Initial design equations are proposed, providing good results, facilitating the design of the FSS for other resonant frequencies and specific applications. An FSS has been designed, fabricated, and characterized, with good agreement between numerical and experimental results. The resonant frequency remains practically constant for different incidence angles, from 0º to 30º, confirming the angular stability.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes the development of a double sided band-pass frequency selective surface based on Matryoshka geometry, preserving features such as miniaturization, multiband operation and the stability of polarization and incidence angle. Unlike cascaded FSSs, the proposed FSS uses only one substrate layer, with the Matryoshka geometry being used on one of its faces and a square loop on the other. The use of only one layer of substrate reduces the volume, as well as facilitates the fabrication process, since it avoids the use of spacers. On the other hand, the square loop allows to improve of the frequency response. Initial design equations are proposed, providing good results, facilitating the design of the FSS for other resonant frequencies and specific applications. An FSS has been designed, fabricated, and characterized, with good agreement between numerical and experimental results. The resonant frequency remains practically constant for different incidence angles, from 0º to 30º, confirming the angular stability.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Planar filter for microwave loss analysis in nickel and cobalt ferrite samples
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Planar filter used to analyze microwave loss in Nickel and Cobalt samples

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper analyzes the absorption behavior of nickel ferrite (NFO) and cobalt ferrite (CFO) samples using a multiband planar fractal filter, along with the study of the crystal lattice of each sample. The geometry of the resonator used is the fourth iteration of the Hilbert fractal. The Hilbert curve is employed to compress the filter area and increase the interaction area with the tested sample. The resonance frequency is approximately 1.1 GHz, within the range of 0.7 to 1.6 GHz. Filter measurements were conducted with samples of each material to evaluate their specific characteristics.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper analyzes the absorption behavior of nickel ferrite (NFO) and cobalt ferrite (CFO) samples using a multiband planar fractal filter, along with the study of the crystal lattice of each sample. The geometry of the resonator used is the fourth iteration of the Hilbert fractal. The Hilbert curve is employed to compress the filter area and increase the interaction area with the tested sample. The resonance frequency is approximately 1.1 GHz, within the range of 0.7 to 1.6 GHz. Filter measurements were conducted with samples of each material to evaluate their specific characteristics.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Microstrip 3-Bit Fractal-based Phase Shifter
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Microstrip 3-Bit Fractal-based Phase Shifter

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: JOURNAL OF MICROWAVES, OPTOELECTRONICS AND ELECTROMAGNETIC APPLICATIONS

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents the implementation of a 3-bit microstrip fractal-based phase shifter operating in the 430 MHz to 470 MHz frequency range. The fractal structure is used to confine different delay line lengths in the same area due to the space-filling properties of the used Hilbert fractal curve. The proposed design has three bits corresponding to 45, 90, and 180 degrees phase changes selected according to the switching circuit based on a Double Pole Double Throw (DPDT) switch implemented with PIN diodes. Comparisons between simulated and measured results are shown according to the chosen degree of use of PIN diodes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents the implementation of a 3-bit microstrip fractal-based phase shifter operating in the 430 MHz to 470 MHz frequency range. The fractal structure is used to confine different delay line lengths in the same area due to the space-filling properties of the used Hilbert fractal curve. The proposed design has three bits corresponding to 45, 90, and 180 degrees phase changes selected according to the switching circuit based on a Double Pole Double Throw (DPDT) switch implemented with PIN diodes. Comparisons between simulated and measured results are shown according to the chosen degree of use of PIN diodes.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este livro reúne temas da Engenharia Elétrica/Eletrônica que compõem disciplinas básicas e específicas do curso de mesmo nome, e que são, hoje, imprescindíveis ao engenheiro da Área de Telecomunicações. Seu conteúdo oferece material de estudo e consulta para várias disciplinas do Curso da Graduação em Eng. Elétrica/Eletrônica, tais como Eletromagnetismo, Dispositivos para Microondas, Tópicos especiais em microondas, Microondas, Antenas, e Propagação Eletromagnética; no Programa de Pós-Graduação em Eng. Elétrica, auxilia nas disciplinas de Dispositivos de Microondas, Medidas em Microondas, e Antenas. 
 No Capítulo 1, o mecanismo de propagação de ondas eletromagnéticas no espaço livre e em estruturas guiadas é descrito de maneira didática e compreensível, mantendo, entretanto, o rigor que se exige em um curso de nível superior. Evitam-se aqui as deduções de expressões matemáticas mais envolventes, descritivas das grandezas eletromagnéticos, e que podem ser facilmente encontradas em outros textos afins. O tema ?Propagação Eletromagnética? é aqui tratado visando levar o leitor a um melhor entendimento do projeto de um enlace de microondas em visada direta, assunto esse tratado no último capítulo.
 O Capítulo 2 introduz os conceitos básicos relativos às antenas, bem como a descrição de vários tipos, para as diversas faixas de freqüência usualmente encontradas em aplicações do dia-a-dia. Um longo texto é dedicado às antenas parabólicas, por serem elas comumente usadas em projetos de radioenlace. O texto é intencionalmente enriquecido de fotografias e desenhos necessários a um melhor entendimento de sua construção e operação. Detalhes sobre cálculo de diretividade, diagrama de radiação, relação frente-costas etc, são aqui omitidas por não serem o objetivo deste livro. 
 O uso de RF na identificação de partes que compõem um sistema (em assuntos de segurança, por exemplo) tem exigido um maior conhecimento e desenvolvimento de antenas planares. O texto dedi

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Provides practical coverage of the design and implementation
of frequency measurement receivers, which aid in identifying
unknown signals;
? Explores the technologies used in frequency measurement
interferometry-based on-delay lines and filters;
? Provides concrete examples of microwave photonics implementations;
? Explains the designs and concepts that cover conventional photonic
instantaneous frequency measurement (IFM) circuits;
? Provides details on new designs for microwave photonic circuits and
reconfigurable frequency measurement (RFM) circuits using diodes and
MicroElectroMechanical Systems (MEMS);
? Covers the many diverse applications of frequency measurement that are
used in defense, radar, and communications;
? Explains the instrumentation used to perform frequency measurement,
including the use of block analysis for network and spectrum analyzers
and calibration techniques;
? Offers insight into the future of frequency measurement receivers;
? Examines both the underpinnings and the implementation of frequency
measurement receivers using many diverse technological platforms.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The rapid development of radar, communication and weapons guidance systems generates an urgent need for microwave receivers to detect possible threats at the earliest stage of a military mission. The microwave receivers used to intercept the RF signals must be able to meet these challenges. Thus, microwave receivers have become an important research area because of their applications to electronic warfare (EW).
The instantaneous frequency measurement (IFM) receiver has been mostly incorporated in advanced EW systems. As to perform the fundamental function, which is to detect threat signals and provide information to the aircrafts, ships, missiles or ground forces, the IFM receiver offers high probability of intercept over wide instantaneous RF bandwidths, high dynamic ranges, moderately good sensitivity, high frequency measurement accuracy, real time frequency measurement and relatively low cost.
IFM started out as a simple technique to extract digital RF carrier frequency over a wide instantaneous bandwidth mainly for pulsed RF inputs. It is been gradually developed to a resourceful system for real time encoding of the RF input frequency, amplitude, pulse width, angle of arrival (AOA) and time of arrival (TOA) for both pulsed and continuous wave (CW) RF inputs. For many electronic support measures (ESM) applications, the carrier frequency is considered to be one of the most important radar parameters, since it is employed in many tasks: sorting, even in dense signal environments; emitter identification and classification; and correlation of similar emitter reports from different stations or over long time intervals, to allow emitter location.
An IFM receiver is an important component in many signal detection systems. Though numerous improvements have been made to the design of these systems over the years, the basic principle of operation remains relatively unchanged, in that the frequency of an incoming signal is converted into a voltage proportional to the fre

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This chapter introduces radio frequency and microwave frequency measurement basic theory and concepts, including S-parameter analysis of an arbitrary two-port network and high-frequency signal analysis in time and frequency domains.
The instrumentation used to perform frequency measurement, such as sweep frequency generators and network and spectrum analyzers, are described using block analysis. Main frequency detection devices, including analogue instantaneous frequency measurement, frequency sweep, fast Fourier transform, direct frequency counter, digital frequency discriminator, and their circuits are covered in this chapter.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This chapter introduces radio frequency and microwave frequency measurement basic theory and concepts, including S-parameter analysis of an arbitrary two-port network and high-frequency signal analysis in time and frequency domains.
The instrumentation used to perform frequency measurement, such as sweep frequency generators and network and spectrum analyzers, are described using block analysis. Main frequency detection devices, including analogue instantaneous frequency measurement, frequency sweep, fast Fourier transform, direct frequency counter, digital frequency discriminator, and their circuits are covered in this chapter.

Different designs for analog and digital frequency discriminators for use in IFM receivers are presented and discussed over in the following sections.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This chapter presents photonic approaches to IFM through building on the original concept of IFM presented in in Chapter 2 and exploiting the many advantages offered by photonics such as broad instantaneous bandwidth, immunity to electromagnetic interferences (EMI), low loss, light weight, the capacity of parallel processing of several signals, and the compatibility with fiber signal distribution to overcome limitations related to the electronic IFM presented in previous chapters, with the objective of improving system performance.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Radio Frequency Identification system, initially projected for objects identification in large
scale ? a counterpart of the well-known barcode, has been expanding its horizons and has
been used for the automation of several services such as tracking goods, credit card
charging, supply chain controlling, and others. RFID systems consist on a Reader that
interrogates an identification Tag and this, in turn, sends an identification code back to the
Reader. Specifically, the passive RFID Tags take advantage of being free of batteries. It
converts part of the incoming RF signal from the reader into power supply. Because of its
versatility, lots of researchers have been investing on RFID, which, despite the 35 years old
of the first patent, is still considered new and somewhat obscure. This chapter covers topics
including the system surveying and the working basics of the RFID, especially the physical
air interface between the RFID tags (the mobile part) and the so-called Interrogators, which
are fixed part of the network. This chapter focuses on the project of 2.45 GHz planar
antennas, with a gain higher than the commercial ones, in such a way that, when these
brand new antennas are used in RFID tags, they increase the system efficiency. More
coverage area can be achieved with these higher gain antennas, as well as lower power
requirements of the Interrogators. Most of the necessary theory topics to project this antenna
are shown. As well as the theory, measured and simulated results are presented such as:
input impedance, frequency response, radiation pattern and gain, which could certainly be
the starting point for future works.
With respect to academic research over RFID, it is increasing year after year. The number of
publications in important periodicals is increasing in recent years. This happens due to its
great applicability in many areas like, health, commerce, safety, etc. In recent years, it is
becoming one of the most attractive areas in

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: A multiband Yagi-Uda patch antenna with different orders Koch fractal

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: JOURNAL OF MICROWAVES, OPTOELECTRONICS AND ELECTROMAGNETIC APPLICATIONS

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This article explores the performance of a Yagi-Uda patch antenna with Koch fractal geometry of different orders on an FR-4 substrate. It exhibits multiband operation, enabling the use across multiple frequency bands. The proposed reflector features equally spaced slots. The reflector element has a Koch fractal geometry of order 2, while the third directive element of the antenna is shaped as a Koch fractal of order 1. The antenna was designed and simulated using CST Studio from 1 GHz to 10 GHz. After fabrication, measurements with a vector network analyzer (VNA) verified the presence of 11 operational bands with resonance frequencies centered at 1.265 GHz, 1.545 GHz 2.59 GHz, 2.7 GHz, 3.05 GHz, 3.9 GHz, 5 GHz, 5.18 GHz, 5.71 GHz, 6.20 GHz, and 8.72 GHz. It results in an aggregate bandwidth of 622 MHz (Ultra-Wideband, UWB) with applications in a range of protocols and technologies. The antenna dimensions are only 65 mm x 45 mm, resulting in a compact size.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article explores the performance of a Yagi-Uda patch antenna with Koch fractal geometry of different orders on an FR-4 substrate. It exhibits multiband operation, enabling the use across multiple frequency bands. The proposed reflector features equally spaced slots. The reflector element has a Koch fractal geometry of order 2, while the third directive element of the antenna is shaped as a Koch fractal of order 1. The antenna was designed and simulated using CST Studio from 1 GHz to 10 GHz. After fabrication, measurements with a vector network analyzer (VNA) verified the presence of 11 operational bands with resonance frequencies centered at 1.265 GHz, 1.545 GHz 2.59 GHz, 2.7 GHz, 3.05 GHz, 3.9 GHz, 5 GHz, 5.18 GHz, 5.71 GHz, 6.20 GHz, and 8.72 GHz. It results in an aggregate bandwidth of 622 MHz (Ultra-Wideband, UWB) with applications in a range of protocols and technologies. The antenna dimensions are only 65 mm x 45 mm, resulting in a compact size.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O invento trata de um arranjo de antenas inteligentes, chaveado, para sistemas de supervisão tipo SCADA (Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition), proporcionando uma comunicação confiável, via rádio, entre o Centro de Operação Integrada ? COI, com os dispositivos de automação telecomandados, utilizados em proteção em redes de distribuição de energia elétrica. O sistema proposto controla a direção do lóbulo principal do diagrama de radiação do arranjo variando a fase da alimentação individual das antenas, aumentando o ganho da potência transmitida, evitando assim que sejam instaladas estações repetidoras entre o COI e o dispositivo alvo. Sistemas SCADA são tipicamente usados em concessionárias de serviços de distribuição de energia, gás, água, entre outros, que tenham a necessidade de usar telemetria para conectar equipamentos separados por grandes distâncias..
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The invention deals with an array of intelligent antennas, switched, for SCADA type supervisory systems (Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition), providing a reliable radio communication between the Integrated Operation Center - COI, with the remote control automation devices, used in protection in electricity distribution networks. The proposed system controls the direction of the main lobe of the arrangement's radiation diagram by varying the phase of the individual antenna feed, increasing the gain of transmitted power, thus preventing the installation of repeater stations between the IOC and the target device. SCADA systems are typically used in concessionaires of energy, gas, water distribution services, among others, that have the need to use telemetry to connect equipment separated by great distances.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Patente de Invenção de conector que opera em altas frequências,mecanicamente robusto para suportar as condições severas de usonas linhas de transmissão e eletromagneticamente compatível,compreende um dispositivo MDSC (1), que opera em alta frequência,composto de um conector tipo N e de um suporte conectado aoconector tipo N, para o encaixe de uma segunda haste, agoracobreada de aterramento, como haste de referência, ainda o ditodispositivo MDSC (1) se interliga a uma placa de teflon (2), que estápresa por buchas de teflon (3), a um elemento rosqueado quepermite o encaixe de um olhal de referência (4), assiminterconectando analisador de redes vetorial a hastes de âncora,sendo capaz de detecta anomalias nessas hastes sem que haja anecessidade de inspeção visual..
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Connector invention patent that operates at high frequencies, mechanically robust to withstand the harsh conditions of the transmission lines and electromagnetically compatible, comprises an MDSC device (1), which operates at high frequency, composed of a type N connector and a support connected to type N connector, for fitting a second rod, now grounded as a reference rod, the MDSC device (1) is connected to a teflon plate (2), which is secured by teflon bushings (3) , to a threaded element that allows the fitting of a reference eye (4), as well as connecting a vector network analyzer to anchor rods, being able to detect anomalies in these rods without the need for visual inspection.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O presente certificado de adição se refere a um arranjo de antenas
inteligentes, chaveado, para sistemas de supervisão tipo SCADA
(Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition, traduzido para Sistemas
de Supervisão e Aquisição de Dados), proporcionando uma
comunicação confiável, via rádio, entre o Centro de Operação
Integrada COI, com os dispositivos de automação telecomandados,
utilizados em proteção em redes de distribuição de energia elétrica.
O sistema proposto controla a direção do lóbulo principal do
diagrama de radiação do arranjo, variando a fase e a amplitude da
alimentação individual das antenas, aumentando o ganho da
potência transmitida, evitando, assim, que sejam instaladas estações
repetidoras entre o COI e o dispositivo alvo. Sistemas SCADA são
tipicamente usados em concessionárias de serviços de distribuição
de energia, gás, água, entre outros, que tenham a necessidade de
usar telemetria para conectar equipamentos separados por grandes
distâncias. Além das características descritas acima, esta invenção
possibilita a supervisão dos dispositivos de automação numa
cobertura de 360° em torno da ERB correspondente.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Sistema para detecção de desgastes causados por corrosão em
parafusos olhais de ancoragem, patente de invenção de um sistema
capaz de se conectar por um lado a equipamento de medição e por
outro ao parafuso olhal possibilitando a inserção de sinais. Desta
forma é possível caracterizar o estado do parafuso olhal a partir da
comparação dos sinais obtidos. o sistema é caracterizado por
compreender, um adaptador de formato cilíndrico (1), que em uma
de suas faces é capaz de acoplar no parafuso olhal e face oposta,
conecta-se ao conector (2) por um furo central, uma placa de formato
circular (5) posicionada entre o adaptador (1) e o conector (2) e uma
barra de formato cilíndrico que se conecta ao conector (2) permitindo
a inserção de sinais, por meio de instrumentos de medição.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
786 / 5.000
System for detecting wear caused by corrosion in anchoring eyebolts, patent for the invention of a system capable of connecting to measuring equipment on one side and to the eyebolt on the other, enabling the insertion of signals. In this way, it is possible to characterize the condition of the eyebolt by comparing the signals obtained. The system is characterized by comprising a cylindrical adapter (1), which on one of its faces is capable of coupling to the eyebolt and on the opposite face, it connects to the connector (2) by a central hole, a circular plate (5) positioned between the adapter (1) and the connector (2) and a cylindrical bar that connects to the connector (2) enabling the insertion of signals by means of measuring instruments.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
?Sistema com Software Embarcado e Processo para Inspeção de Falhas Estruturais em Hastes Metálicas?
Patente de invenção de sistema com software embarcado e processo para inspeção de falhas estruturais, tais como, corrosão ou desgastes em hastes de âncoras enterradas em solo e envoltas por camada de cimento no interior de tubo de PVC; compreende um analisador de redes vetorial que é controlado por software embarcado em um computador raspberry o qual possui uma tela touch screen, que permite interação com usuário, ainda, o dito analisador de redes vetorial se conecta a um cabo coaxial o qual se interliga a um conector de micro-ondas de suporte e conexão ? MDSC que se acopla diretamente a uma haste de âncora e a condutores de referência.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
?System with Embedded Software and Process for Inspection of Structural Failures in Metal Rods?
System invention patent with embedded software and process for inspection of structural failures, such as corrosion or wear on anchor rods buried in the ground and wrapped by a cement layer inside the PVC pipe; comprises a vector network analyzer that is controlled by software embedded in a raspberry computer which has a touch screen, which allows interaction with the user, yet the said vector network analyzer connects to a coaxial cable which is connected to a support and connection microwave connector - MDSC that attaches directly to an anchor rod and reference conductors.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este projeto tem como objetivos principais: 1 - investigar parâmetros relacionados a propagação de microondas em filmes supercondutores tais como, impedância de superfície, comprimento de penetração, velocidade de fase, velocidade de grupo, constante de atenuação, espessura do filme, etc usando técnicas de ressoadores de microfita. Esses parâmetros serão fatores seletivos na escolha do filme/substrato a ser usado na fabricação do dispositivos de microonda. 2 ? pretende-se fabricar dispositivos passivos coplanares de microondas usando filmes supercondutores já selecionados. Entre esses dispositivos de microondas incluímos: guia de ondas coplanares, divisores de potência coplanares, linhas de atraso coplanares e medidores instantâneos de freqüência (MIF).

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: European Microwave Week- 36th European Microwave Conference

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A new filter duplexer with open loop resonators, having inside stubs, for GSM band in the DSC1800 Cellular Radio Base Station (RBS) standard is presented. The filters use resonators of square open loop types. The insertion of the stubs allows the perimeter of the loop to be less than l/2, which is the length used in the well-known canonical loop. The device was fabricated on PTFE (RO3010) board. An eight poles selective filter with a single pair of attenuation poles was used. The full wave EM simulator was used to obtain the desired dimensions of the resonators. Simulated and measured results are presented here.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Coplanar Antenna Array for 2.45GHz RFID Tag

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: European Microwave Week- 36th European Microwave Conference

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e Silva
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SILVA, Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Sistemas de Telecomunicações

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A new CPS Antenna design is presented. This antenna is suitable for RFID Tags, operating at 2.45GHz. The device was fabricated on RT6002 substrate of thickness h=1.5 mm. Input impedance control is based on the conformal mapping technique. A full wave EM simulator was used to obtain the frequency response. Simulated and experimental results are presented

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Microstrip Diplexer for GSM and UMTS Integration Using Ended Stub

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: IEEE 2007 International Microwave and Optoelectrônics Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A novel microstrip diplexer design for UMTS and
GSM ranges is presented. This device was implemented by using
microstrip resonator with serial coupling. The modified gap
structure allows to adjust the operating frequency of the filters
and reduces the dimensions of the device as it will be presented.
Simulation results of the diplexer are presented. Device has been
simalated on Duroid RT6010 substrate of thickness 0.61 mm. A
new diplexer can be used for sharing radiating system of both
UMTS and GSMplatforms.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Ressoador Quadrado de Malha Aberta com Stubs Internos

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Apresentamos um novo tipo de ressoador de malha aberta. Através da inserção de stubs no 
perímetro interno de um ressoador é possível transladar a freqüência de ressonância desses ressoador para freqüências inferiores a freqüência de ressonância do ressoador de malha aberta sem stubs. È possível tirar proveito dessa característica, no sentido de tornar possível a realização de filtros sintonizados em faixas de freqüências distintas, com mesma dimensão externa do ressoador. São apresentadas simulações de filtros, que utilizam esse tipo de ressoador, em software de simulação Eletromagnética. Os dispositivos foram construídos e as medições apresentadas para validação da aplicação do ressoador.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Frequency Shifting Using Corrugated Coupled Microstrip Lines

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2005 International Microwave and Optoelectronics

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Coupled microstrip lines are used to suit a wide variety of circuit applications like directional couplers and filters. Another coupled line variety called corrugated coupled microstrip modifies the phase velocities of the two eigen-modes in the direction of propagation. This property can be used in the design of fase shift couplers, i.e., the coupled wave is phase shifted with respect to the input wave, and in the design of filters with suppression of spurious response at twice the frequency center. The property cited above is used here to discuss other important feature of the corrugated coupled microstrip lines that doesn?t appear in the conventional literature: frequency shift. The simulations performed in an appropriate software show that the idea works very well and can be useful in microwave devices like duplex, diplex and multiplex.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: A New Power Divider for Interferometers of Instantaneous Frequency Meters

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XI Simpósio Brasileiro de Microondas e Optoeletrônica

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A new configuration for the classical Wilkinson power divider to be used in interferometers of Instantaneous Frequency Meters (IFM) is proposed in this paper. Unlike the Wilkinson power divider, it has coupling independent of the frequency. A higher reflection obtained at output ports is compensated with a higher isolation between them and a much lower reflection at input. Furthermore, it enables the construction of smaller coplanar interferometers without any jumpers so that the circuit design has a greater flexibility and the implementation is cheaper. A prototype of the power divider is being developed and the simulated results are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Projeto de um Duplex GSM em Microfita para Aplicações em Telefonia Móvel Celular

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XI Simpósio Brasileiro de Microondas e Optoeletrônica

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O rápido crescimento das redes sem fio e das
comunicações móveis tem estimulado o desenvolvimento de
vários dispositivos de RF e microondas. Dentre estes
dispositivos está o duplex, que possibilita a redução da
quantidade de meios de transmissão e antenas. Este artigo
propõe a implementação de um duplex de baixa potência
operando na faixa GSM-1800 MHz, utilizando microfita. Esta
proposta se fundamenta na freqüente redução do espectro de
freqüência disponível, o que implica uma tendência natural de
redução das potências das estações radiobase devido à
necessidade de reuso de freqüências.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Medida da Permissividade Complexa do Gesso Tipo Piso-Cola com Baixas Perdas em Frequências de Microondas

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: X SIMPÓSIO BRASILEIRO DE MICROONDAS E OPTOELETRÔNIC

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Medidas Elétricas, Magnéticas e Eletrônicas; Instrumentação
AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Medidas Elétricas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Um método simples de obtenção da permissividade complexa utilizando a teoria básica de linha de transmissão em notação matricial é utilizado para obter a permissividade complexa do gesso tipo piso-cola a partir da medida dos parâmetros S. Resultados preliminares dessas medidas são realizados substituindo o gesso pelo dielétrico numa linha de transmissão de diâmetro interno 2,2mm, diâmetro externo 22mm e comprimento 130mm, com um analisador de redes operando em freqüências de 0.3MHz até 1,4GHz num processo de medida automatizado.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Coplanar Power Splitter Design and Measurement

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: INTERNATIONAL MICROWAVE AND OPTOELECTRONICS CONFERENCE

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The authors have studied a coplanar power splitter. The device was etched on a single sided RT/duroid 6010. Results of insertion loss are presented. This balanced structure presents an insertion loss value of 0.2dB plus 3dB splitting loss at 1.15GHz without any airbridges. Measurement results seem attractive to the design of coplanar instantaneous frequency measurement subsystem (IFMS).

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: COPLANAR STRIPS INTERDIGITAL DELAY LINE FOR INSTANTANEOUS FREQUENCY MEASUREMENT SYSTEMS

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 1996 IEE COLLOQUIUM ON Advanced Signal Processing for Microwave Applications

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Fabricação de Aparelhos e Equipamentos de Telecomunicação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The authors have studied a coplanar interdigital delay line with different finger lengths. Results of characteristic impedance and group delay are presented. Measurement results agree well with simulation and the transmission line seems attractive for the design of coplanar instantaneous frequency measurement subsystem (IFM). A prototype system is briefly discussed.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: A Novel LSB Discriminator for a 5 bit IFM Subsystem Based on Microstrip Band-Stop Filter

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: European Microwave Conference

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e Silva
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SILVA, Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: A new way to design IFM( ) system is presented. The method used is based on band-stop filters. The IFM uses rectangular open loop resonators. The resonance frequency is adjustable by resonator perimeter, that must be half guided wavelength, and also by coupling distance between the resonators and the main transmission line. This IFM system has its LSB ( ) resolution of 62.5MHz. The device was fabricated on RT6010.2 substrate of thickness h=1.27mm. A full wave EM simulator was used to obtain the frequency response. Simulated and experimental results are presented.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Simulation of a Real Overvoltage Transient in a TLM-Modeled Grounding Mesh
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Simulation of a Real Overvoltage Transient in a TLM-Modeled Grounding Mesh

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: COMPUMAG 2008

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e Silva
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SILVA, Fábio Rodrigo de Lima e

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Medição, Controle, Correção e Proteção de Sistemas Elétricos de Potência

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents the behavior of a grounding mesh in presence of a high-frequency overvoltage transient caused by switch closing in electrical substation. The simulation of the mesh is based on Transmission Line Method (TLM). The output of the simulation is the sum of induced and conducted currents caused by such high-frequency overvoltage input in some spot of the mesh. Thin wires are represented by nodes developed by Naylor and Christopoulos. This way, the simulation runs much faster than those with short-circuit nodes. Details on the soil properties effect such as resistivity and permittivity are provided.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: A Diplexer for UMTS Applications

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: IMOC 2009

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
In this article a microstrip diplexer is proposed
which has good performance on the UMTS upload and download
bands, as shown by simulation results and actual measurements.
The diplexer is based on a two-pole resonator named H-type
resonator, and makes strong use of cross-coupling to pass energy
between ports. The fractional bandwidth for both bands is about
3%. The diplexer has an insertion loss of less than 1dB and
provides more than 20dB of isolation. A lumped element model
for the diplexer is also derived, and its response is shown to be
in good agreement to the microstrip diplexer.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Matriz de Butler para Sistemas de Antenas Inteligentes do Tipo Arranjo de Fase

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Electric Field in Overhead Transmission Line for PLC Signal
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Electric Field in Overhead Transmission Line for PLC Signal

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 14th Biennial IEEE Conference on Electromagnetic Field Computation (IEEE CEFC2010)

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This paper shows a new way to calculate the
electric field configuration produced in the vicinity of an
Overhead Transmission Line (OHTL), when a information signal
is inserted at one of these phases. The technology is called Power
Line Communication (PLC) and through the software CST
Microwave Studio®, it is possible to establish a region in the
vicinity of the conductors to observe the obtained values which
are compared with Brazilian standards limits.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Using Genetic Algorithms for Device Modeling
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Using Genetic Algorithms for Device Modeling

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 14th Biennial IEEE Conference on Electromagnetic Field Computation (IEEE CEFC2010)

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
In this article, genetic algorithms are used to find
the optimal values for the lumped elements of a given discrete
model such that its response best match the modeled device?s
response. By applying the method for different values of the
device?s parameters, the relationship between the model?s and the
device?s parameters can be found. An application of the method
to a bandpass filter shows that it can give quite precise results.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Triplexer Filter for Application in Integration of UMTS and WLAN Systems
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Triplexer Filter for Application in Integration of UMTS and WLAN Systems

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 15th Internacional Symposium on Applied Electromagnetics and Mechanics
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: Japan Society of Applied Electromahnetics and Mechanics

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A Triplexer Filter with open-loop resonators, having
internal stub, for the UMTS and WLAN bands is presented.
Insertion of stubs allows the loop perimeter to be less than λ/2,
which is the length used in canonical loop. An eight-pole selective
filter with a single pair of attenuation poles was used. A full wave
EM simulator was used to obtain the dimensions of the
resonators. Simulations were made using RO3010 substrate. The
simulation results are presented.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
A Triplexer Filter with open-loop resonators, having
internal stub, for the UMTS and WLAN bands is presented.
Insertion of stubs allows the loop perimeter to be less than λ/2,
which is the length used in canonical loop. An eight-pole selective
filter with a single pair of attenuation poles was used. A full wave
EM simulator was used to obtain the dimensions of the
resonators. Simulations were made using RO3010 substrate. The
simulation results are presented.

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: J. H. de A. Dias Silva

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents the design of a smart directive antenna array used to concentrate and point the radiation beam toward a desired direction. The design is especially aimed at supervision systems of electric power distribution switches with the objective to replace the vertical arrays of electric dipoles commonly used by electric power distribution companies. Simulation and experimental results have demonstrated the proposed four Yagi-Uda antenna array performs well when compared to an array of four vertical folded dipoles.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents the design of a smart directive antenna array used to concentrate and point the radiation beam toward a desired direction. The design is especially aimed at supervision systems of electric power distribution switches with the objective to replace the vertical arrays of electric dipoles commonly used by electric power distribution companies. Simulation and experimental results have demonstrated the proposed four Yagi-Uda antenna array performs well when compared to an array of four vertical folded dipoles.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Equilateral-Triangular Microstrip Antenna with Enhanced Gain Using Triangular Loop FSS
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Equilateral-Triangular Microstrip Antenna with Enhanced Gain Using Triangular Loop FSS

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2018 International Symposium on Information Technology Convergencie

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Passive equilateral-triangular microstrip
antenna is reproduced, where it is used an amplifier to increase
the antenna gain. Enhanced gain of the antenna is achieved by
employing an FSS as superstrate that is formed by the 2 x 2
array of triangular loops. The antenna operates at 1.73 GHz,
and the distance between the antenna and superstrate is 30
mm. The superstrate influence on the antenna behavior is
analyzed. The gain improvement depends on the resonance of
the FSS superstrate, and the antenna gain increased from 3 to
5.7 dB while maintaining a good matching level for the
resonant frequency. Thus, one proposes a FSS that can
improve the antenna gain presented without using active
devices.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

antenna is reproduced, where it is used an amplifier to increase

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Novel Multiband Orientation-Insensitive FSS Based on Dipole for Chipless RFID
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Novel Multiband Orientation-Insensitive FSS Based on Dipole for Chipless RFID

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2018 International Symposium on Information Technology Convergencie

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
In this paper, a new FSS unit cell geometry is
presented. Pairs of vertical and horizontal slot dipoles are used to
create an orientation-insensitive multiband pass frequency
response. The proposed structure operates in the C-band (4-6
GHz) and X-band (8-12GHz) and presents ten resonant
frequencies. Since each passband is independent, this geometry is
suited for application as chipless orientation-insensitive RFID
tags. The S21 simulation results are present and were carried out
by CST Microwave Studio.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

presented. Pairs of vertical and horizontal slot dipoles are used to

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Instantaneous frequency measurement (IFM) using filters and delay lines
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Instantaneous frequency measurement (IFM) using filters and delay lines

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Workshop - Frequency measurement systems and cognitive radio- ISITC 2018

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Unknown frequency identification allows detecting hazards or targets, e.g. communication transmitters or radar. The task of frequency discrimination also enables the creation of sensor heads or frequency identification tags. This workshop aims to provide a comprehensive view of frequency measurement and frequency identification systems and circuits. Frequency measurement is covered from design to implementation with examples; instantaneous frequency measurement (IFM) using designs based on delay lines and filters will be presented. Reconfigurable frequency measurement (RFM) circuits for low weight and low power consumption implementations is covered using PIN diodes, varactor diodes and RF MEMS capacitors. The work related to RFM is supported by the NATO SPS Program, where the goal of producing RFM based receivers for unmanned aerial vehicles is the main task. The workshop also includes cognitive radio (CR), which is expected to become a key technology to effectively manage the exploding wireless traffic by a huge number of IoT sensor nodes in the near future. In this presentation, the concepts, technical issues such as the shadowing problem and fast spectrum sensing, receive architecture and circuit designs for CR will be briefly reviewed.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Unknown frequency identification allows detecting hazards or targets, e.g. communication transmitters or radar. DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: A Novel Microstrip Frequency Discriminator for IFM Based on Balanced Gray-code
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: A Novel Microstrip Frequency Discriminator for IFM Based on Balanced Gray-code

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: IMOC 2017

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Lauro R. G. S. L. Novo
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: Lauro R. G. S. L. Novo

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This work presents the design, simulation,
fabrication and measurement of a novel set of microstrip filters
to perform the task of frequency discriminators. These filters?
frequency responses are based on the balanced Gray-code.
Results show that the use of the balanced Gray-code, as opposed
to the traditional Gray-code, allowed 20% circuit size reduction
by using 60% less resonators due to a change in the resonators?
orientation.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This work presents the design, simulation,
fabrication and measurement of a novel set of microstrip filters
to perform the task of frequency discriminators. These filters?
frequency responses are based on the balanced Gray-code.
Results show that the use of the balanced Gray-code, as opposed
to the traditional Gray-code, allowed 20% circuit size reduction
by using 60% less resonators due to a change in the resonators?
orientation.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
GENERAL CHAIR OF THE 20TH SBMO IEEE MTT-S INTERNACIONAL MICROWAVE AND OPTOELECTRONICS CONFERENCE 

The SBMO/IEEE MTT-S International Microwave and Optoelectronics Conference is a biennial forum on microwave, millimeter wave, terahertz and photonics methods and techniques for both science and engineering, sponsored by the Brazilian Microwave and Optoelectronics Society (SBMO) and the IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE MTT-S).


IMOC 2023 will provide a major international forum for exchanging information on research and development in the theoretical and experimental fields of Microwaves and Optoelectronics including Millimeter, Terahertz, Antennas, Propagation, Wireless Communication, Fiber Optics and Photonics Networks. In its twentieth edition, the conference will be held at the amazing city of Castelldefels-Barcelona, the best beach in Spain, near Barcelona Center, from November 5th to 9th, 2023.


A selection of invited speakers will highlight important and developing areas. Authors are asked to submit their camera ready papers in IEEE double column format. The papers will be assessed by an international review board. English is the official language of the conference and all published papers will appear on the IEEE Xplore system.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The terahertz (THz) frequency range (ca. 0.1 to 10 THz) is still considered to be a largely unexplored part of the electromagnetic spectrum. This ?THz gap? between conventional electronics and optics offers the potential for increased research funding and commercial exploitation, along with an urgent need for developing traceable standards in metrology. There are many ubiquitous applications that could be created to enhance our modern day living, resulting in a huge impact for society and economic growth. In telecommunication, wireless links often represent a bottleneck, due to the lack of available bandwidth. Frequency bands above 100 GHz offer a unique opportunity to overcome this limitation. Along with the continual push by the semiconductor industry to increase the upper frequency limits of Si and SiGe devices, dedicated THz science and engineering is helping to integrate devices with novel functional materials and innovative micro/nano-fabrication technologies. An increasing demand for surveillance of objects and individuals in restricted zones (e.g. airports, stations, large public events, etc.) has recently brought the terahertz range into focus. This is due to the non-ionizing nature of THz radiation and its ability to penetrate through non-metallic construction/packaging materials and clothes. Moreover, its short wavelength can achieve high spatial resolution imaging. Again, novel engineering approaches in conjunction with advanced functional materials and micro/nano-fabrication technologies represent key areas of innovation.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Teoria Eletromagnetica, Microondas, Propagação de Ondas, Antenas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O Laboratório de Inovações em Micro-Ondas, gerido pelo Grupo de Fotônica vinculado ao Departamento de Eletrônica e Sistemas do Centro de Tecnologia e Geociências (CTG) da UFPE, foi inaugurado, ontem (25), no Campus Recife. A cerimônia foi realizada no anfiteatro do Departamento de Eletrônica e Sistemas, no 4º andar do CTG, seguida de visita ao laboratório, que fica em edificação térrea, ao lado do prédio do CTG, na área do estacionamento do centro. O espaço destina-se a atividades de pesquisa, fortalecendo a formação de estudantes de graduação e de pós-graduação e aproximando a academia do mercado.

No novo espaço, serão feitas atividades práticas e teóricas de pesquisas sobre micro-ondas, linhas de transmissão, biossensores, entre outros aspectos afins, sempre buscando inovações na produção do conhecimento científico e em sintonia com demandas do mercado e de parceiros dos setores público e privado. O local conta com máquina de prototipagem, máquina 3D a laser, equipamentos de metalização, equipamentos usados em alta frequência para link de rádio, gerador de micro-ondas, antenas de alta qualidade, entre outros. A localização do laboratório é estratégica, pois facilita a realização de experimentos em local adequado, o transporte de equipamentos e a manutenção geral do laboratório.
De acordo com o coordenador do Laboratório de Inovações em Micro-Ondas, Marcos Tavares, o espaço é fruto do trabalho desenvolvido pelo Grupo de Fotônica. ?Esse laboratório surgiu pela necessidade de dar continuidade a um processo [de pesquisas] que foi iniciado há, mais ou menos, 20 anos?, disse ele. ?Então, nós temos parte das atividades sendo realizadas no Grupo de Fotônica, e a outra parte das necessidades, que é a prototipagem, e atividades de campo que a gente precisa usar a nossa região ao redor do laboratório, como teste com antena, como o desenvolvimento de malhas de alta frequência, aterramento, vários testes que a gente precisa que sejam realizados numa estrutura deste tipo, u
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The Microwave Innovations Laboratory, managed by the Photonics Group linked to the Department of Electronics and Systems of the Center for Technology and Geosciences (CTG) at UFPE, was inaugurated yesterday (25) at Campus Recife. The ceremony was held in the amphitheater of the Department of Electronics and Systems, on the 4th floor of the CTG, followed by a visit to the laboratory, which is located in a ground floor building, next to the CTG building, in the downtown parking area. The space is intended for research activities, strengthening the training of undergraduate and graduate students and bringing academia closer to the market.

In the new space, practical and theoretical research activities will be carried out on microwaves, transmission lines, biosensors, among other related aspects, always seeking innovations in the production of scientific knowledge and in line with the demands of the market and of partners in the public and private. The place has a prototyping machine, 3D laser machine, metallization equipment, equipment used in high frequency for radio link, microwave generator, high quality antennas, among others. The location of the laboratory is strategic, as it facilitates carrying out experiments in a suitable place, transporting equipment and general maintenance of the laboratory.
According to the coordinator of the Laboratory of Innovations in Microwaves, Marcos Tavares, the space is the result of the work developed by the Photonics Group. ?This laboratory arose out of the need to continue a process [of research] that started more or less 20 years ago,? he said. ?So, we have part of the activities being carried out in the Photonics Group, and the other part of the needs, which is prototyping, and field activities that we need to use in our region around the laboratory, such as antenna testing, as the development of high frequency meshes, grounding, various tests that we need to be carried out in a structure of this type, a structure that does

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-ORIENTACOES-CONCLUIDAS-.TITULO: Aplicação de filtros planares de microondas com ressoadores de malha aberta e stubs internos em duplexadores
DADOS-BASICOS-DE-ORIENTACOES-CONCLUIDAS-.TITULO-INGLES: Application of planar microwave filters with open loop resonators and internal stubs in duplexers

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Métodos e Técnicas de Ensino

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Medidas Elétricas, Magnéticas e Eletrônicas; Instrumentação

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Fabricação de Máquinas, Aparelhos e Materiais Elétricos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O desenvolvimento tecnológico tem provocado um rápido crescimento dos sistemas de comunicações móveis, o que tem feito com que as operadoras sejam obrigadas a implantar diversos sistemas em uma mesma estrutura vertical, torre. O duplexador é um dispositivo que permite a redução da quantidade elementos que compõem um sistema irradiante. Ele consiste em dois filtros passa-faixa, sintonizados nas bandas de uplink e downlink, interligados através de um divisor de potência. O dispositivo é projetado e construído em Microfita. São utilizados ressoadores do tipo malha aberta, com a inserção de stubs no perímetro interno. No decorrer da dissertação será demonstrado que a inserção dos stubs permite a confecção de filtros sintonizados em faixas distintas e com mesmo perímetro externo. Também será demonstrado que através da inserção de stubs no perímetro interno de um ressoador de malha aberta a freqüência de ressonância é modificada para valores inferiores. É utilizada a função transferência para filtro seletivo com par de zeros em freqüências finitas, que garante uma alta seletividade aos filtros. É apresentada uma técnica em que um simulador eletromagnético de onda completa é utilizado para obtenção dos coeficientes de acoplamento e fator de qualidade dos filtros, conseqüentemente as dimensões dos ressoadores. Os resultados de simulação serão apresentados em comparação com valores teóricos esperados.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The technological development has been provoking a fast growing of the mobile communications system. Due to this fact the Players are forced to implant several systems in a same vertical structure, tower. The duplexer is a device allows the reduction of the amount elements which compose an irradiated system. One consists of two filters pass-band, tuned in the uplink band and downlink band, connected by a power divider. The device is projected and built in Microstrip. The resonators used are open loop type, with the inserted stubs in the internal perimeter. In that study will be shown that the insertion of the stubs allows the production of filters, tuned in different bands and with same external perimeter. It will be also show that due to the insertions of stubs, the resonant frequency is changed to lower values. The transfer function used was the selective filter one with single pair of attenuation at finite frequencies, which ensures a high selectivity to the filters. A full wave electromagnetic simulator is used to obtain the couplings coefficients and external Q-factor, as a result the dimensions of the resonators. The simulation results will be presented in comparison with expected theoretical values.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Os sistemas IFM (do inglês Instantaneous Frequency Measurement) são largamente usados na eletrônica para fins militares e em sistemas inteligentes para a detecção de sinais desconhecidos com velocidade e precisão ao longo de uma larga banda do espectro de frequências. Além disso, o aumento da quantidade de sistemas irradiantes faz crescer a importância de dispositivos para identificação de sinais desconhecidos. O sistema IFM monitora, de forma simultânea, todas as frequências da banda para a qual foi projetado, sem a necessidade de fazer uma varredura de espectro, detectando instantaneamente os sinais desconhecidos. Nos sistema IFM existem os circuitos discriminadores de fase. Os sinais de saída dos discriminadores de fase servem para formar um código binário que associa uma palavra binária a uma sub-banda de frequência. Nesse trabalho, será demonstrado, através de equações de projeto, simulações eletromagnéticas e medições experimentais, o comportamento de interferômetros coplanares de micro-ondas atuando como discriminadores em um sistema IFM simples de 4 bits. Esse sistema é projetado para operar na banda de 5 a 6 GHz, com uma resolução de 62,5 MHz, identificando 16 sub-bandas distintas de frequência. Os interferômetros coplanares são implementados com circuitos de micro-ondas em CPS (do inglês Coplanar Strips) e CPW (do inglês Coplanar Waveguide), apresentando resultados em concordância com a teoria.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: IFM (Instantaneous Frequency Measurement) systems are widely used in Electronic Warfare and intelligence systems for the detection of unknown signals with speed and accuracy over a wide band of spectrum. Furthermore, the increased amount of radiant systems increases the importance of devices to identify unknown signals. The IFM system monitors, simultaneously, all frequencies in the band for which it was designed without the need of scanning the spectrum, instantaneously detecting unknown signals. In IFM system, there are the phase discriminators circuits. The output signals from the phase discriminators are used to form a binary code that associates a binary word to a sub-band of frequencies. The behavior of microwave coplanar interferometers acting as discriminators in a simple 4-bits IFM system, through the design equations, EM simulations and experimental measurements, will be presented. This system is designed to operate from 5 to 6 GHz with a resolution of 62.5 MHz, identifying 16 distinct sub-bands of frequency. The coplanar interferometers are implemented with CPS (Coplanar Strips) and CPW (Coplanar Waveguide) microwave circuits, and present results in agreement with the theory.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The fast increasing of mobile telecommunication systems has forced most of
telephony operators to deploy new communication technologies (UMTS, WiMAX,
Mesh) on top of existing ones (GSM, WLL, GPRS, CDMA). However, due to the
large cost of building the necessary physical infrastructures for a new network, it
is highly desirable to reuse any towers and antennas already built. Duplexers are
a type of microwave circuit element that can help to achieve this goal by allowing
a reduction on the number of radio elements and transmission lines used in these
networks, as well as the sharing of the radiating system. In this work, it is presented
a novel UMTS duplexer based on H-type resonators which has good performance on
the UMTS uplink and downlink bands. Design techniques are also presented. The
device has been fabricated and tested on microwave laboratory of Electronics and
Systems Department of UFPE. Futhermore, experimental and simulation data are
compared in order to evaluate the performance of design techniques.
